description: The Greek Islands, Cyprus and Turkey – all dream destinations. And here’s your chance to win a £1,500 voucher so that you can explore these wonderful destinations with Manos holidays.
title: COMPETITION: Win a £1,500 Thomas Cook holiday voucher
title_page: COMPETITION: Win a £1,500 Thomas Cook holiday voucher  | Daily Mail Online
text:
The Greek Islands, Cyprus and Turkey – all dream destinations.
And here’s your chance to win a £1,500 voucher so that you can explore these wonderful destinations with Manos holidays.
For over 50 years Manos, part of the Thomas Cook group, has been helping travellers explore the beauty and diversity of the Eastern Mediterranean.
For over 50 years Manos, part of the Thomas Cook group, has been helping travellers explore the beauty and diversity of the Eastern Mediterranean. Pictured is Mykonos, one of the destinations you can explore with the firm
Its passion started with experiencing the authentic sounds, sights and tastes of Greece and its beautiful islands.
Now it’s spreading its wings.
For summer 2018 it’s introducing Turkey and Cyprus to its portfolio, so there’s now even more to discover.
Manos offers holidays that focus on small, local-run hotels to suit your needs and budget.
For summer 2018 Manos is introducing Turkey, pictured, and Cyprus to its portfolio, so there’s now even more to discover
And from summer 2018, all Manos bookings will be covered by Thomas Cook’s ‘24 Hour Hotel Satisfaction Promise’.
So now is the perfect time to start thinking differently about your next holiday and consider something truly authentic.
